slide1.title: Onboarding
slide1.subtitle: Welcome
slide1.description: Customize this onboarding screen for your app.

camera.title: Capture Jewelry
camera.instruction: Point camera at a jewelry piece
camera.instructionSubtext: AI will analyze gemstones, metals, and value

imageReview.title: Review Photo
imageReview.readyDescription: Get detailed analysis of this jewelry including its type, gemstones, materials, era, and estimated value.
imageReview.errorMessage: Unable to identify the jewelry. Please try again.

collection.title: My Collection
collection.emptyStateDescription: Start scanning jewelry to build your personal collection

itemDetails.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this jewelry from your collection?
itemDetails.unableToIdentifyMessage: We couldn't identify this jewelry piece. Please try again with a clearer photo.
itemDetails.rangeTooBroad: Price range too broad for reliable estimate
itemDetails.authenticityNote: For accurate appraisal and authentication, please consult a certified gemologist.

goodLighting.title: Good Lighting
goodLighting.description: Natural daylight works best. Avoid harsh shadows and direct sunlight.

focusClearly.title: Focus Clearly
focusClearly.description: Tap on the item to focus. Wait for the image to sharpen before capturing.

steadyHands.title: Steady Hands
steadyHands.description: Hold your phone steady or rest it on a surface for sharper images.

fillFrame.title: Fill the Frame
fillFrame.description: Position the jewelry to fill most of the scanning frame.

showDetails.title: Show Details
showDetails.description: Include maker's marks, signatures, or distinctive features.

learn.title: Learn About Jewelry
learn.introText: Learn about different types of jewelry, gemstones, and how to identify them.

rings.name: Rings
rings.description: From engagement rings to statement pieces, learn about ring styles, settings, and gemstones.

necklaces.name: Necklaces
necklaces.description: Discover the world of necklaces, from delicate chains to elaborate statement pieces.

earrings.name: Earrings
earrings.description: Explore earring styles from studs to chandeliers, and the gemstones that adorn them.

tips.tip1: Look at the metal: Is it gold, silver, or platinum?
tips.tip2: Check for hallmarks: They reveal metal purity and origin
tips.tip3: Examine the gemstones: Note color, cut, and clarity
tips.tip4: Observe the craftsmanship: Quality indicates age and value
tips.tip5: Consider the style: Different eras have distinctive designs

learn.footerText: Use the camera tab to identify jewelry pieces!

premiumUpgrade.title: Unlock Premium

premiumUpgrade.features: • No daily limits • Priority AI processing • Premium support

demoMode.disabledMessage: Your original jewelry collection has been restored.
demoMode.activeMessage: Demo mode active - Ready for screenshots!
demoMode.errorMessage: Failed to toggle demo mode. Please try again.

testMode.title: Test Mode
testMode.label: Testing Features
testMode.description: Lower thresholds for rating (1 scan), 10 free scans
testMode.enabledMessage:
Test features activated:

• Rating prompt after 1 identification
• 10 free scans instead of 3
testMode.activeMessage: Test mode active - Using test configurations

alerts.purchasesRestoredMessage: Your premium access has been restored!
alerts.noPurchasesFoundMessage: We couldn't find any previous purchases to restore.
alerts.restoreFailedMessage: Unable to restore purchases. Please try again later.

unlimitedScans.title: Unlimited Scans
unlimitedScans.description: Identify as many items as you want

fasterProcessing.title: Faster Processing
fasterProcessing.description: Priority API access for instant results

accuracyBoost.title: Accuracy Boost
accuracyBoost.description: Enhanced AI model for better identification

prioritySupport.title: Priority Support
prioritySupport.description: Get help when you need it

subscription.webNotSupported: Subscriptions are not available on web. Please use the mobile app.

camera.title: Camera Access Needed
camera.description: This app needs camera access to take photos for AI-powered identification. Your photos are processed securely and never shared.
camera.skipText: You can also grant permission in settings

photos.title: Photo Library Access Required
photos.description: This app needs access to your photo library to select existing photos for identification.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.identificationFailed: Failed to identify. Please try again.
errors.imageQualityPoor: Image quality insufficient. Please provide a clear, well-lit image.
errors.cameraPermission: Camera permission is required to use this feature.
errors.galleryPermission: Photo library permission is required to use this feature.

alerts.restartOnboardingMessage: This will show you the welcome screens again.
alerts.demoModeEnableMessage: Enable demo mode with sample jewelry data?
alerts.demoModeDisableMessage: Disable demo mode and return to normal operation?
alerts.deleteItemMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your collection?

main.subtitle: Discover and identify jewelry with AI-powered analysis

identifyButton.title: Identify Jewelry
identifyButton.subtitle: Take a photo to analyze and identify

permissions.camera: Jewelry Identifier needs camera access to take photos of jewelry for instant AI-powered identification. For example, when you photograph a ring, the app analyzes its gemstones, metals, and craftsmanship to identify the piece and provide detailed information.
permissions.photos: Jewelry Identifier needs photo library access to save identified jewelry images to your collection and to select existing photos of jewelry from your library for identification. For example, you can identify jewelry from photos of inherited pieces.
permissions.microphone: Jewelry Identifier requires microphone access to record videos with audio when documenting jewelry pieces. This allows you to add voice notes to your jewelry discoveries.

prompt.analyzeInstruction: Analyze this jewelry image and identify it. Focus on identifying gemstones (diamonds, rubies, emeralds, sapphires, pearls), metal types (gold, silver, platinum), jewelry style/era (Victorian, Art Deco, Contemporary), craftsmanship quality, and any visible hallmarks or maker's marks.
prompt.jsonOnlyWarning: IMPORTANT: You MUST respond with valid JSON format only, no other text.

unableToIdentify.instruction: If the image is unclear, too dark, or cannot be analyzed, respond with this JSON:
unableToIdentify.name: Unable to Identify
unableToIdentify.funFactMessage: Please provide a clear, well-lit image of the jewelry for accurate identification

prompt.analyzableInstruction: For analyzable jewelry images, respond with:

fields.name: Jewelry type and style (e.g., Art Deco Diamond Ring, Victorian Pearl Brooch)
fields.composition: material1, material2 (metals and secondary materials - max 6)
fields.formation: Craftsmanship details, setting type, manufacturing technique
fields.uses: era, style, occasions (e.g., Art Deco Period, Engagement Ring - max 4)
fields.funFact: Interesting fact about this jewelry style, gemstone, or era
fields.description: Brief description of the jewelry piece (2-3 sentences covering style, craftsmanship, and notable features)
fields.rarity: common | uncommon | rare | very_rare | legendary (based on materials, age, uniqueness)
fields.gemstone: Primary gemstone name (e.g., Diamond, Ruby, Emerald) or None if no gemstones
fields.caratWeight: Estimated carat weight of main gemstone(s) (e.g., 1.5 carats, 2 carats total)
fields.jewelryWeight: Estimated total weight in grams (e.g., 8.2 grams, 15 grams)
fields.estimatedValue: Estimated market value range in USD (e.g., '$500 - $1,500', '$2,000 - $5,000')

prompt.responseLanguageInstruction: ALL text in your response must be in English.
